message: I don't see an option to search for a specific group. I'm worried about creating groups when there may already be similar groups out there.

For example, I created an "Entrepreneurship" group but it was hard to tell if there was already a group called "Startups" or "Entrepreneurs" or anything like that as the search appears to look through all the conversations.
@pmn you have to go to the groups Discover page, then go to the search groups tab on that page
Maybe in future the search bar at the top can auto-result two categories simultaneously: posts and groups
@spencer yeah, or groups, topics and replies
@djchall Kind of a weird way to get there, but it'll work; thanks!
@pmn yeah, i already made a feature request to add all of the explore groups tabs to the Discover menu
the search already seems to distinguish between topics and replies, which is nice
